com.percussion.util
Class IOTools

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.util.IOTools

public class IOTools
extends Object

The IOTools class contains IO helper utilities.

copyStream

public static long copyStream(InputStream in,
                              OutputStream out)
                       throws IOException
Convenience method. Copies all of the bytes from the InputStream to the OutputStream using a default buffer size of 8k.

Throws:
IOException
See Also:
copyStream(InputStream, OutputStream, int)

copyStream

                              OutputStream out,
                              int bufSize)
                       throws IOException
Convenience method. Copies all of the bytes from the InputStream to the OutputStream using a default buffer size of 8k.

Throws:
IOException
See Also:
copyStream(InputStream, OutputStream, int)

copyStream

public static long copyStream(InputStream in,
                              OutputStream out,
                              int bufSize,
                              long limit)
                       throws IOException
Copies all of the bytes from the InputStream to the OutputStream. The output buffer will be flushed, but neither stream will be closed by this method. It is the responsibility of the caller to close both streams.

Parameters:
in - The input stream to get bytes from. Never null.
out - The output stream to send bytes to. Never null.
bufSize - The number of bytes to transfer at a time.
limit - the number of bytes copied, if -1 then no limit.
Returns:
The number of bytes transferred.
Throws:
IOException - If an I/O exception occurs during stream processing.
IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is invalid.

writeStream

public static long writeStream(Reader in,
                               Writer out)
                        throws IOException
Convenience method. Copies all of the bytes from the InputStream to a Writer with an 8k buffer.

Throws:
IOException
See Also:
writeStream(Reader, Writer, int)

writeStream

public static long writeStream(Reader in,
                               Writer out,
                               int bufSize)
                        throws IOException
Copies all of the characters from the supplied Reader to a Writer. The output buffer will be flushed, but neither stream will be closed by this method. It is the responsibility of the caller to close both streams.

Parameters:
in - The input reader to get characters from. Never null.
out - The output writer to send characters to. Never null.
bufSize - The number of characters to transfer at a time. If the value specified is zero or negative, the default size (8k) will be used.
Returns:
The number of characters transferred.
Throws:
IOException - If an I/O exception occurs during stream processing.
IllegalArgumentException - If any argument is invalid.

compareStreams

public static boolean compareStreams(InputStream alpha,
                                     InputStream bravo)
                              throws IOException
Compares two streams for equality byte-by-byte.

Parameters:
alpha - compared to bravo, not null.
bravo - compared to alpha, not null.
Returns:
true if the two streams are the same size and identical; false otherwise.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null.
IOException - if a problem occurs reading from the streams.

compareReaders

public static boolean compareReaders(Reader alpha,
                                     Reader bravo)
                              throws IOException
Compares the characters read by two readers for equality.

Parameters:
alpha - compared to bravo, not null.
bravo - compared to alpha, not null.
Returns:
true if the two readers are the same size and have identical characters; false otherwise.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null.
IOException - if an error occurs while reading.

copyFile

public static void copyFile(File source,
                            File dest)
                     throws IOException
Copy file helper. Note that the underlying method of copying may result in a lock on the files for a few seconds following the copy.

Parameters:
source - never null.
dest - never null.
Throws:
IOException - on any file error.

copyFileStreams

public static void copyFileStreams(File source,
                                   File dest)
                            throws IOException
Copy file helper. Uses streams instead of channels.

Parameters:
source - never null.
dest - never null.
Throws:
IOException - on any file error.

copyToDir

public static void copyToDir(File file,
                             File targetDir)
                      throws IOException
Copies the provided file to the provided directory. If the provided file is a directory copies it recursively. If any of the copied files already exist they are overwritten.

Parameters:
file - file to copy, never null.
targetDir - directory to create copies in, never null.
Throws:
IOException

copyToDirs

public static void copyToDirs(File dir,
                              List targetDirs)
                       throws IOException
Copies the contents of the directory to the provided directories.

Parameters:
dir - directory to copy, never null.
targetDirs - list of directories to create copies in, never null.
Throws:
IOException

deleteFile

public static void deleteFile(File file)
Deletes file or directory. If directory is not empty recursively deletes it.

Parameters:
file - file to delete.

getFileContent

public static String getFileContent(File file)
                             throws IOException
Get the file content as string (utf-8 encoded).

Parameters:
file - file to read content from, may not be null.
Returns:
content as string, never null, may be empty.
Throws:
IOException

getContent

public static String getContent(InputStream stream)
                         throws IOException
Get the stream content as string (utf-8 encoded). It is the responsibility of the caller to close the stream.

Parameters:
stream - stream to read content from, may not be null.
Returns:
content as string, never null, may be empty.
Throws:
IOException

createTempFile

public static File createTempFile(File file)
                           throws IOException
Creates a copy of the given file in the default temporary directory

Parameters:
file - the file to copy, may not be null
Returns:
the temporary file
Throws:
IOException

createBackupFile

public static File createBackupFile(File file)
                             throws IOException
Creates a backup of the given file by appending .000, .001, etc. to its name.

Parameters:
file - the resulting backup file will be file.000,...,etc., may not be null and must exist.
Returns:
a file reference to the newly created backup.
Throws:
IOException

getChecksum

public static long getChecksum(File file)
                        throws IOException
Get the checksum for the supplied file as a CRC-32 value.

Parameters:
file - The file, may not be null.
Returns:
The checksum of the file.
Throws:
IOException - on any file error.

getChecksum

public static long getChecksum(String str)
Get the checksum for the supplied string as a CRC-32 value.

Parameters:
str - The string, may not be null.
Returns:
The checksum of the file.
